title: Blue Origin will ‘move heaven and Earth’ to help NASA reach the Moon faster, CEO says
summary: "We have some ideas that we think could accelerate the path to the Moon."

title: Live coverage: Blue Origin to launch NASA’s Mars-bound ESCAPADE mission
summary: This will be the second launch of a New Glenn rocket and NASA's first mission to Mars since 2020. Liftoff from pad 36 at Cape Canaveral Space Force Station is scheduled for no earlier than Nov. 9 at 2:45 p.m. EST (1945 UTC).

title: ATMOS to Launch Demonstration Mission Aboard Baguette One Rocket
summary:
German space logistics company ATMOS Space Cargo has signed a memorandum of understanding with French launch services provider HyPrSpace to carry out a demonstration mission aboard its Baguette One rocket. Founded in 2019, HyPrSpace is developing a suborbital demonstration rocket called Baguette One, slated for launch in 2026. The rocket will serve as a technology […]
The post ATMOS to Launch Demonstration Mission Aboard Baguette One Rocket appeared first on European Spaceflight.

title: AST SpaceMobile sheds more light on sovereign direct-to-device plan for Europe
summary:
AST SpaceMobile has registered plans with international regulators via Germany for a sovereign, space-based network that would provide broadband directly to devices across Europe, the U.S.-based satellite operator said Nov. 7.
The post AST SpaceMobile sheds more light on sovereign direct-to-device plan for Europe appeared first on SpaceNews.

summary:

title: Live coverage: SpaceX to launch 29 Starlink satellites on Falcon 9 rocket from NASA’s Kennedy Space Center
summary: The mission will be SpaceX’s 560th Falcon 9 rocket launch to date. It’s targeting liftoff from pad 39A at NASA’s Kennedy Space Center at 3:30 a.m. EST (0830 UTC).

title: Copernicus Sentinel-1D journey to space
summary: The Copernicus Sentinel-1D satellite has joined the Sentinel-1 mission in orbit. Launch took place on 4 November 2025 at 22:02 CET (18:02 local time) on board an Ariane 6 launcher from Europe’s Spaceport in French Guiana.
